summary: Draining life dagger made for vampires.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]*** I'M NOT UPDATING THIS MOD ANYMORE ***
I'm sorry for the trouble but I'm a student, I made this mod when I was 13, completely forgot about it and now see it has some downloads and people even make comments. Now thing is I don't have time for it, only on weekends and if I'm not going to be able to support it as much is I want, I prefer not to at all. Thanks for the nice comments tho, and I really want to continue this mod and will as soon as I get a chance. Again, sorry for the trouble ^^'[/size][/color][/b]

First of all, you should now that this one is my first mod, so don't expect flying trains.

-DESCRIPTION
This is a dagger wich is made for vampires and uses the Daedra Dagger texture, but I'll try to make my own. It has a powerful Absorb Life enchantement, the best one.

-CRAFTING
You should be able to craft the dagger in any of Skyrim's forges, you'll find it under the "MISC" section. Ingredients needed:
-1 Daedra Heart
-1 Human Heart
-1 Vampire Dust
-2 Deathbell
-1 Ebony ingot
This will give you two daggers (the idea is to use both at the same time).
***** NOTE that only vampires can craft it *****
(So don't tell me that your vampire hunter can't craft the dagger)

-COMPATIBILITY
This is a light mod that shouldn't enter in conflict with ANY other mod, but please report any bugs.
Custom vampire races should be able to craft the dagger, but please report any bugs. (Tested with Better Vampires 6-6 by Brehanin and worked)

-TO DO
I'll make a small dungeon, full of vampires, where two unic daggers will be the reward. Then you won't be able to craft it, it wouldn't make sense.
My own texture (a very bloody dagger)

Hope you like it!

(If this interests someone, Kemaro is my vampire stealth assassin character).

Steam Workshop link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=244187065

-CHANGELOG
-1.0 - First Release
-1.1 - .esm file description fixed
-1.2 - Removed frost resistance and modified item description

By the way now you can submit bug reports. Even though I said I'm not updating this mod, I want you to know that I'll check out every bug report and if I come back with the mod (which I will eventually do) I'll try to fix them all.
author: Cottand
